resources.string: Here the joke will be displayed
Why is the spider the most needy animal in the world? \\nBecause it is an aracneedyou.
Why doesn\'t the pine tree get lost in the forest? \\nBecause it has a pine cone.
What did a pagodeiro do in the church? \\nIt was singing PÁ GOD.
Why was Napoleon always called to parties? \\nBecause he was GOOD ON PARTY.
What is the king of cheese? \\nIt is the curd.
Why doesn\'t the old lady wear a watch? \\nBecause she\'s a lady.
When did the Americans first eat meat? \\nWhen Cristovão Com Tombo arrived.
